abstract: FairPoint Communications‘s amended $2.7 billion merger with Verizon Communications‘s local phone operations in the New England states won general approval from Maine regulators, the company said Friday.
lead_paragraph: FairPoint Communications‘s amended $2.7 billion merger with Verizon Communications‘s local phone operations in the New England states won general approval from Maine regulators, the company said Friday.

headline.main: FairPoint and Verizon Edge Closer to Clinching Deal
